thread.section_title: Otticanet Recensioni| Recensioni dei clienti per Otticanet | www.otticanet.com
thread.title: Alex S
thread.title_full: Otticanet recensione scritta da Alex S

author: Alex S
title: Alex S
text: I badly wanted a pair of Tom Ford sunglasses. I had just splurged for regular TF frames in the US, with progressive lenses, and could not afford that on top of the price. But kept wanting them. So I found this site, with the frames for exactly half the price. I was nervous about them being fake, etc., but ordered using PayPal for additional protection. They arrived from Italy via FEDEX within 3 days of ordering, absolutely perfect. I chose not to get prescriptions done, as I found an optician doing progressives locally. No hesitation with this vendor, whatsoever.
